title: Po the Person: Came for the Culture War Stayed for the Religion...
description:
Po is an engineer in the UK that got started YouTubing about the time I did and pretty much in the same wave. We've been watching each other's videos and so it was time for a conversation. 

Notes
If God has a plan why do we pray for things? 

What's the point in telling God what we want? 

Their answers didn't satisfy

The idea of God didn't match the scientific understanding of the univers

Is an engineer, Got really into math at 14

Jordan Peterson, Youtube will be like the Gutenberg press

James Damore about women in Engineering

The prescriptive and the descriptive view of religion

He didn't start with a series of things you had to believe in or facts you believe in

What if you were the best person you could possible be, what if you committed to be better

Could you imagine 

Most of the people in his classes were women

Came for the culture war, stayed for the religion

If you need a manual for life why the bible and not classics? 

2019 Kanye Album

Pewdipie

The LOTR is the fan fiction of the bible

Tribe 

Rick and Morty, Roy simulation
